item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour ‘Overview’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/nintendo-switch-2-welcome-tour-overview-trailer

  • Switch 2

A five-minute introduction to the interactive exhibit.

Nintendo has released a five-minute overview trailer for Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour, its interactive exhibit that introduces the features and hardware of Switch 2.

Here is an overview of the game, via Nintendo.com:

Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour is an interactive exhibit of sorts that offers an inside look at the features and tech that power your gaming experiences. Look, touch, and feel your way through the different exhibits.

Uncover lots of insights about the system. Explore basic features, like the magnetic connectors that keep the Joy-Con 2 controllers firmly attached, and more advanced tech details that you might not otherwise notice.

Roam the exhibit halls, which resemble a giant Nintendo Switch 2. Discover hidden facts, take quizzes, and enjoy playful minigames.

The more you explore, the more you’ll learn! Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour contains secrets and surprises you may even want to share with friends.

Nintendo Switch 2 Welcome Tour is due out for Switch 2 via Nintendo eShop on June 5 for $9.99.

Watch the trailer below.

Overview Trailer

Japanese

item.title: Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road ‘Selectable Characters’ trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/inazuma-eleven-victory-road-selectable-characters-trailer

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2
  • Xbox Series

Meet the game's 15 Selectable Characters.

LEVEL-5 has released a new trailer for Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road introducing the game’s 15 “Selectable Characters,” as well as a behind the scenes interview with the voice cast.

“In this new title’s ‘Selectable Character’ system, you’ll need to choose five out of 15 story-related characters to complete the South Cirrus Eleven, part of which are enthusiastically voiced by amazing guest talents!” reads the game’s official website. “The characters you choose will take an active part in the story, making the conversation events even more lively! Your selection, your team!”

The 15 Selectable Characters are as follows:

  • Winsor Compete (voiced by HIKAKIN) – Hot-Blooded Sumo Powerhouse
  • Charis Benzaie (voiced by Michaela Wako Sato) – The Possessed Actor
  • Maine Alsop (voiced by Takushi Izawa (QuizKnock)) – Seeker of Life’s Answers
  • Dario Highton (voiced by Rai Inami (NIJISANJI)) – Challenger Aiming for the Top
  • Amelia Rainwalker (voiced by Ichijou Ririka (hololive DEV_IS)) – Second-Life Class President
  • Marisol Cavallo (voiced by Maika Sasaki (＝LOVE)) – The Pursuer of Beauty
  • Meridia Althoff (voiced by Lisa Hanabusa (VSPO!)) – Master of the Way of Kendo
  • Tai Richter (voiced by Sango Suo (NIJISANJI)) – All-Seeing Strategist
  • Davin Bullock (voiced by Masai (Fischer’s)) – The Unstoppable Rampage
  • Lycus Foxworth (voiced by Toshiya Miyata (Kis-My-Ft2)) – Legerdemain Virtuoso
  • Florent Shorleigh (voiced by Florent Shorleigh) – Boisterous Surfer
  • Antonia Felicier (voiced by Fumiko Orikasa) – Auspicious Country Girl
  • Kelvin Steelborne (voiced by Fujiko Takimoto) – Metallic Heart
  • Lemmy Stretchen (voiced by Yuki Tai) – Butler of Beguilement
  • Starla Thorn (voiced by Ayahi Takagaki) – The Wild Rockstar

Inazuma Eleven: Victory Road is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on August 21 worldwide.

Watch the trailer and cast interview below.

Selectable Characters Showcase

English

Japanese

Cast Interviews: Behind the Scenes

item.title: Tango Gameworks office reopens, now recruiting staff for unannounced action game
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/tango-gameworks-office-reopens-now-recruiting-staff-for-unannounced-action-game

The offices of Hi-Fi RUSH developer Tango Gameworks‘ reopened today following the studio’s acquisition by KRAFTON in August 2024, the company announced. It is currently hiring for a number of positions for early work on an unannounced action game.

“It took us some time, but the official office for Tango Gameworks, Inc. is open, and our hybrid work environment finally has its in-office counterpart!” the studio said in today’s update. “These things take time, but our office in Tokyo is back open as we fill it with our memorabilia from our projects and begin decorating based on our new brand identity!”

Tango Gameworks is hiring across almost every department. Positions include senior application programmer, senior graphics programmer, senior system programmer, user interface programmer, senior level designer, senior animator, cutscene manager, senior video effects technical artist, senior character artist, facilities manager, and IT support. Job qualifications suggest it the unannounced action game will utilize Unreal Engine and launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC.

Visit the studio’s newly launched website here.

item.title: FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time sales top 800,000
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/06/fantasy-life-i-the-girl-who-steals-time-sales-top-800000

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Expected to surpass one million units sold in June

Total sales for slow-life RPG FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time have surpassed 800,000 units in 10 days on the market, publisher LEVEL-5 and developer LEVEL-5 Osaka announced. Considering the current sales momentum, LEVEL-5 said it expects the title to surpass one million units sold within June.

FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time launched for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on May 21 worldwide, and is to Switch 2 on June 5. It sold 500,000 copies within its first two days of release.

“Since launch, [FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time] has received an overwhelming response far beyond expectations, with the download version performing strongly on digital platforms both in Japan and internationally,” LEVEL-5 said. “On several platforms, the game even ranked #1 for multiple days and sales have continued to grow steadily ever since.”

Here is a brief overview of the game, via LEVEL-5:

The latest installment in the FANTASY LIFE series is a brand-new adventure set on a deserted island within the mysterious and beautiful world of Reveria.

In this slow-life RPG, players can freely switch between 14 unique Lives (jobs) and enjoy life at their own pace.

As they embark on a journey across time, spanning 1,000 years, they’ll work to restore the island while uncovering the great mystery hidden within.
